step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arm overhead and feeling the stretch. Keep your arm straight and feel that resistance.
You're stretching your arm overhead. Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide for the next step.
Great! Now, make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Remember to visualize the fluid moving.
Excellent! You opened your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Keep up this motion and visualization.
Good start on your second repetition, keeping your arm straight overhead and feeling the resistance.
You're stretching your arm overhead. Make sure your palm and fingers are open wide.
Nicely done making a fist while inhaling and tightening. Keep visualizing the fluid being pumped out.
You opened your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Great job completing the exercise!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a fist while inhaling, and relax while exhaling. Keep up the good work!
